title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4403.7 - Contracts for audio-visual broadcasts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4403.7 - Contracts for audio-visual broadcasts

State Regulations

The plan of operation shall include any agreement for a
radio broadcast or for a television broadcast of any racing program or of any
part thereof, or of any other event at a track within or without this State. Each such contract shall include a provision that the contract shall not be
effective unless such contract is approved by the commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4403.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
